actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to remove the existing percentage limits on the amount of grant assistance which may be provided thereunder for projects in any one State.

summary.text: Removes the percentage limitations on the amount of urban mass transportation grant assistance which may be available in any one State under the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964. (Repeals 49 U.S.C. 1611)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to remove the existing percentage limits on the amount of grant assistance which may be provided thereunder for projects in any one State.
